title: IEEE Ethically Aligned Design – Prioritize Human Well-being

source.publisher: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE)

contentBlocks.excerpt: Technological innovation should advance human well-being. AIs and autonomous systems (A/AS) should be designed and operated to respect and improve human health, environmental sustainability, and social and economic flourishing.
contentBlocks.rationale: Defines the overarching ethical purpose of intelligent systems as improving—not undermining—human and planetary well-being.
contentBlocks.notes: Widely used in AI policy development, academic AI ethics programs, and international tech governance efforts.
